toolsDetail: TypingO is an online tool in which you check and set your typing speed. This typing tool make your writing speed using keyboard.
PKT-Edit IDE is an online tool in which you edit your code.
PKT-Code Generator is an online tool which you generating the code that you want. Just on a click and few editing
PKT-PolicyO Generator is an online tool which generate the policy for your company. Just on a click and few editing
